Third-Party Components

This project makes use of third-party components. The following list is
provided for informational purposes only and does not replace or modify
the original license texts.

--------------------------------------------------

Component: yt-dlp
Website: https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp
License: The Unlicense (Public Domain)

License text:
See file: yt-dlp.LICENCE

--------------------------------------------------

Component: FFmpeg
Website: https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg
License: LGPL v2.1

License text:
See file: COPYING.LGPLv2.1
Reference:
https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/master/COPYING.LGPLv2.1

--------------------------------------------------

End of third-party notices.
